definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Restaurant light box production must have characteristics, to attract customers.
sentences.chinese: 餐廳燈箱製作肯定要具有特色，要做到吸引顧客。

sentences.english: You can also create ringtones out of songs you downloaded.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以將你下載的歌曲製作成手機鈴聲。

sentences.english: The building is 3-storey high, which is made of stone.
sentences.chinese: 這座屋子高三層，是用外地的石頭製作的。

sentences.english: AS the Nomogram was made, it provided a more simple and convenient method for estimating the lean yield.
sentences.chinese: 列線圖的製作爲估算瘦肉量提供了更簡便的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a successful animal model of steroid-induced osteonecrosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的成功製作激素性骨壞死的動物模型。

sentences.english: I have a homework about HTML need you for help. My group member can not do it!
sentences.chinese: 我有一個網頁製作的作業需要你幫忙。

sentences.english: Paper is one of the most popular handbag making materials.
sentences.chinese: 銅版紙是一種最普及的手提袋製作材料。

sentences.english: The utility model has the characteristics of light and handy volume, convenient operation and no restriction of making materials.
sentences.chinese: 具有體積輕巧，使用方便，製作材料不受限制的特點。

sentences.english: Two of the best M4/3 adaptors I have ever used.
sentences.chinese: 我用過的轉接頭中製作最嚴謹的兩個轉接頭。

sentences.english: Damon combines his moviemaking talents with his desire to help others.
sentences.chinese: 戴蒙將製作電影的才能和幫助他人的慾望結合在一起。

sentences.english: Last installment I mentioned some of the big - picture aspects of creating an exe packer.
sentences.chinese: 上一部分我提到了關於製作加殼程序主要方面。

sentences.english: Describe a handcraft which is made by yourself ?
sentences.chinese: 描述一個你自己親手製作的東西。

sentences.english: In the press in the circuit board, the manufacture quantity of the film is a factor of key.
sentences.chinese: 在電路板制印中，底片的製作質量是一個關鍵的因素。

sentences.english: Glass and a Half Full Productions, home of Cadbury Dairy Milk, the gorilla and trucks.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃和半飽製作，吉百利牛奶，大猩猩和卡車回家。

sentences.english: Do the voice actors ever visit the studio to see the animation process?
sentences.chinese: 演員聲優是否在工作室看到過動畫製作的進程？

sentences.english: The Tahitians taught Captain Cook and his sailors how to make tattoos.
sentences.chinese: 海地人教會了庫克船長和他的海員們如何製作紋身。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to assemble/to concentrate/to mass/to build up/to marshal
to choose for some purpose/to select and use
to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
